name: WD Black P10 4TB External HDD
description: High-performance portable external hard drive with 4TB capacity. Features durable metal enclosure, USB 3.2 Gen 1 for fast transfers up to 140MB/s, and compatibility with PC, Mac, and gaming consoles.

reviews.review_text: Perfect for backing up my entire dev environment.
Solid build quality. Travels well in my laptop bag.
Good value for the storage capacity.
